get.description: Get a list of active metadata keys/paths.

200.description: Object containing an array of metadata keys in the current active resource type.

500.description: The server was unable to service the request.

get.description: Return the metadata object for a single {key}.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Pathname of the entity whose metadata is required.

200.description: The metadata value for the requested key.

404.description: The requested key does not exist.

500.description: The server was unable to service the request.

post.description: Save a metadata object for a specified {key}.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Pathname of the entity whose metadata is required.

201.description: The supplied metadata was saved successfully.

500.description: The server was unable to service the request.

get.description: Get a list of active Signal K keys which have associated metadata.

200.description: Object containing an array of Signal K keys.

500.description: The server was unable to service the request.

get.description: Return the Signal K metadata object for a specified {key}.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: Pathname of the Signal K entity whose metadata is required.

200.description: The Signal K metadata value for the requested key.

404.description: The requested key does not exist.

500.description: The server was unable to service the request.

post.description: Trigger composition of metadata values from metadata configuration files.

500.description: The operation did not complete successfully or the server was unable to service the request.

post.description: Copy/merge all live Signal K metadata objects into the plugin repository.

500.description: The operation did not complete successfully or the server was unable to service the request.

metadata-key.description: Signal K value key expressesed as a Signal K path.

keys.description: List of keys with associated metadata.

value.description: Complete metadata object (see Signal K specification)

req.description: URL that requested a response from the server.
